item.title: Nothing is off the table as Trump and Putin set to meet
item.description: "Trump wants to exhaust all options to have a peaceful end to war," the White House said Thursday. Whether those "options" are good or bad for Ukraine...

item.title: Five things at stake in Trump and Putinâ€™s high-level talks
item.description: Trump-Putin talks in Alaska on Friday could be the catalyst for far-reaching changes for Ukraine, Europe and the world.

item.title: Germany's Merz strikes sharp tone with Europe as he cozies up to Trump
item.description: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has been increasingly critical of the EU, while drawing closer to one of the bloc's biggest critics: President Donald...

item.title: DOJ, SEC charge two men in $200 million water vending machine Ponzi scheme
item.description: Ryan Wear is accused of raising money from investors by selling them water vending machines that, in many cases, did not exist, the DOJ said.

item.title: DOJ fires sandwich thrower after he's charged with assaulting officer in Washington, DC
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel posted a video of a man hurling a Subway sandwich at a U.S. Customs and Border Protection officer.
